items.content_html: A lightweight Android security tool that uses ADB (Android Debug Bridge) to remotely lock or unlock a connected Android device. Ideal for developers, power users, or automation setups that need quick device locking via the command line.
items.title: SyedHamood/Yt-Ad-Blocker: A lightweight Android security tool that uses ADB (Android Debug Bridge) to remotely lock or unlock a connected Android device. Ideal for developers, power users, or automation setups that need quick device locking via the command line.

items.content_html: Recastra is a lightweight TypeScript plugin that uses WebRTC to record audio and video from the user's device directly in the browser. Designed for ease of integration and modern browser compatibility.
items.title: srshkmr/recastra: Recastra is a lightweight TypeScript plugin that uses WebRTC to record audio and video from the user's device directly in the browser. Designed for ease of integration and modern browser compatibility.

items.content_html: DecorAPI is a lightweight, decorator-based framework for building Express.js applications with TypeScript. It brings the elegance of modern TypeScript decorators to Express, making your code more maintainable, testable, and organized.
items.title: tijaniabdellatif/decorAPI-express: DecorAPI is a lightweight, decorator-based framework for building Express.js applications with TypeScript. It brings the elegance of modern TypeScript decorators to Express, making your code more maintainable, testable, and organized.
